0.question: Suzanne has 8 pairs of white socks and 6 pairs of blue socks. Her sister has 12 pairs of white socks. How many pairs of socks does Suzanne have?

1.question: Kurt spent 7 minutes studying for his spelling test. He took a 3 minute snack break. Then he studied for 5 more minutes. How long did Kurt study altogether?

2.question: There were 15 spelling words on the test. Peter spelled 9 words correctly. Miguel spelled 7 words correctly. How many words did Miguel spell incorrectly?

3.question: Mom gave Melissa 10 cherries. Melissa ate 3 of them. Mom gave Melissa 8 more cherries. How many cherries did Mom give Melissa in all?

4.question: Dennis wants to buy 2 candy bars. Candy bars cost 8 cents and gum costs 5 cents. How much will Dennis pay?
